about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate Full-Stack Developer with expertise in GIS systems, team leadership, and AI-powered automation tools

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.paragraph1: I'm a Full-Stack Developer with extensive experience in modern web technologies and GIS systems. My journey began in the IDF tech units where I developed leadership skills while building complex web applications and GIS tools that serve critical operational needs.
summary.paragraph2: I specialize in React, Node.js, Next.js, and Python, with a particular passion for creating reusable libraries and automation tools. My experience spans from microservices architecture to AI-powered chatbots, always focusing on clean code and scalable solutions.
summary.paragraph3: Beyond technical skills, I'm passionate about mentoring developers, leading cross-functional teams, and bridging the gap between complex technical requirements and user-friendly solutions. I thrive in environments where I can combine technical expertise with strategic thinking.

strengths.title: Core Strengths
strengths.description: Combining deep technical knowledge with strong leadership abilities to deliver exceptional results in complex projects.

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Development
fullstack.description: End-to-end development with React, Node.js, Next.js, and Python, creating scalable web applications.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My professional journey and key achievements

idf.title: Full-Stack Developer & Tech Leader
idf.summary: Led development teams and built critical GIS tools and web applications for operational systems
achievements: Led cross-functional development teams of 5+ developers
Developed interactive GIS tools using React, OpenLayers, and GeoJSON
Built microservices architecture with Node.js and Python
Created reusable component libraries reducing development time by 40%
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
Managed project workflows using Jira and Confluence
Implemented automated testing and CI/CD pipelines
Delivered mission-critical applications under tight deadlines

starCar.title: Branch Manager
starCar.summary: Managed daily operations and customer service for a busy car rental branch
achievements: Managed branch operations and team of 8+ employees
Streamlined rental processes and inventory management
Handled complex customer issues and conflict resolution

freelance.title: Freelance Full-Stack Developer
freelance.summary: Building AI-powered bots and web systems for various clients
achievements: Developed AI Fitness Coach with Next.js, Node.js, and Python
Built Anonymous Chat Bot using Node.js and Telegram API
Created automated systems reducing manual work by 60%
Integrated GPT API for intelligent conversational interfaces
Delivered projects on time with 100% client satisfaction

funFacts.title: Fun Facts
items: I enjoy running and sports to clear my mind and stay energized
Music is my passion - I love playing instruments and discovering new sounds
I find coding at night with good music to be incredibly productive
I'm always excited to learn new technologies and experiment with AI tools
I believe the best solutions come from understanding both the technical and human sides

interests.title: Interests & Hobbies
items: Running and outdoor sports for mental clarity
Playing musical instruments and music production
Exploring AI and machine learning applications
Building automation tools that solve real problems
Reading about technology trends and innovations

values.title: Core Values
items: Spirituality and mindfulness in daily life
Honesty and transparency in all relationships
Balance between work, family, and personal well-being

personal.quote: I believe that great technology comes from understanding people. Whether I'm building a complex GIS system or mentoring a junior developer, it's the human connections and shared growth that make the work truly meaningful.
